description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Roughing it in Siberia, with some account of the Trans-Siberian Railway and the gold-mining industry of Asiatic Russia. Illustrated" Author: JEFFERSON, Robert L. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10077.de.32." Page: 83 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Sampson Low & Co.
